Speaker - Biography

Michal ruheen is a global researcher and thought leader focused on unlocking strengths, increasing performance, and pioneering the future of how people work. he is the author of two of the bestselling business books of all time.

Has two of harvard business reviews most circulated, industry-changing cover articles, and his strengths assessments have been taken by over.

Education and qualifications
  • 2002 - Bachelor passed, the city school of london
  • 2004 - Master passed, oxford university, england
  • 2006 - Member of business association, california
  • 2008 - Member of international business association
